title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximizing EC2 Performance: A Hands-on Guide to Instance Optimization  (CMP333)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化 EC2 性能：实例优化实践指南 (CMP333)
abstract: In this hands-on session, learn to build robust data perimeter controls using service control policies (SCPs), resource control policies (RCPs), and VPC endpoint policies to protect sensitive data across AWS accounts. Through hands-on labs, you’ll build data perimeter policies for real-life security scenarios and validate their effectiveness using a custom assessment tool. Learn practical techniques on how to ensure only trusted identities can access trusted resources from expected networks.
abstract_cn: 在这个实践课程中，学习使用服务控制策略（SCP）、资源控制策略（RCP）和VPC终端节点策略构建强大的数据边界控制，以保护AWS账户中的敏感数据。通过实践实验，您将为真实的安全场景构建数据边界策略，并使用自定义评估工具验证其有效性。学习实用技术，确保只有受信任的身份可以从预期网络访问受信任的资源。
